H0.text: Leofric of Mercia was the husband of which famous woman. Aethelflaed

H1.text: Leofric of Mercia was the husband of which famous woman. Matilda of Flanders

H2.text: Leofric of Mercia was the husband of which famous woman. Eleanor of Aquitaine

H3.text: Leofric of Mercia was the husband of which famous woman. Godiva

A4.text: Lady Godiva was a late Anglo-Saxon noblewoman who is relatively well documented as the wife of Leofric, Earl of Mercia.

A5.text: Both Leofric and Godiva were generous benefactors to religious houses.
